content: knitted jacket for baby in drops babymerino the piece is worked top down with saddle-shoulders pattern bm-122-by yarn group a **sizes** <0 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 years child s height in cm 40/44 48/52 - 56/62 - 68/74 - 80/86 92 **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio 100 100-150-150-150 200 g colour 37 light lavender drops buttons no 627 4 5-6-6-6 6 items needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
